message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. It's worth a lot to me, but I'm willing to offer it to you for $115. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $105 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $110.  It's a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $105. Would you be willing to meet me at $108? That's the highest I'm willing to go.
Bob, I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $110.  It's a fair price considering the value of the product.  I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
